title: Tesla Reports Record Profit in Third Quarter on Soaring Sales
description: The electric carmaker is growing fast but investors are worried that sales are starting to slow because of higher prices and interest rates.

title: E.V.s Start With a Bigger Carbon Footprint. But That Doesn’t Last.
description: The manufacturing and disposal of electric vehicles result in more greenhouse gases than nonelectric models, but that difference will eventually disappear altogether.

title: E.V. Bonanza Flows to Red States That Denounce Biden Climate Policies
description: No Republican in Congress voted for the Inflation Reduction Act. But their districts and states will greatly benefit from the investments spurred by the law.

title: I Tried the $1,500 Quest Pro and Saw the Best of the Metaverse
description: It’s not what Mark Zuckerberg promises.
